column2: an A.M. Eatery////This is one of the best breakfasts I have had EVER. Their menu is full of dishes I'd like to try. I got the breakfast pot pie and it was divine - especially the rosemary sausage gravy. But my husband's dish was even better- he got a Cuban breakfast sandwich and it was by far the best breakfast sandwich I've ever had. Our waiter was kind and attentive
column3: and the atmosphere is so nice. We will definitely be back!!!
